title: Which Korean drama has the best jealousy scenes? - Quora

response.answer_text: K-Drama has so many great jealous scenes that never fail to make me smile, especially the rom-com😃 I am naming only 3 as my fave list is too long for me🙃These 3 gives me the laughs, awesome acting & chemistry that are just delightful to watch😃 1.Itaewon Class. One of the newer shows, fine acting & storyline. Totally worth the ratings & watchability. A.Jealous Co-worker  The audacity of this girl😄She lurched & broke off the closeness of Park Seo Joon and Nara as they were holding hands. B.Hell hath no fury like a jealous co-worker!😃  Nara was arching forward to kiss Park Seo Joon on the lips when they were stopped by a jealous Kim Da Mi. It was totally hilarious as she covered Nara’s lips & forcibly pushed her away from Park Seo Joon’s waiting lips😁No kissing allowed outside the office😄  2.Descendant of the SunA.When your girl friends received your delivery package on your behalf  A classic scenario of every boyfriend’s nightmare when the package is from 2 hot girls they went out with previously 🙃🙃🙃🙃🙃  Run Forrest Run😄🙃😃  The girlfriends with the opened package🙈And the interrogation begins😃  The jealous girlfriends with the incriminating evidence😃  When men do not plan their excuses together & the stories does not add up! That’s when they start to sweat buckets🙊🙉🙈 2.When your girlfriends spill the beans on dating the same guy in school. Watch what happens when the tables are turned!😄  That moment when you realised your girlfriends are fighting over the same guy🙊🙉🙈  That awkward moment when you realised your boyfriend can hear your private girl talk😄    3. What’s wrong with Secretary KimA. When your jealousy is triggered by a sports meet  At the company sports’ event, Park Seo Joon caught sight of the new staff chatting up Park Min Young. His jealousy went full steam when he saw the close proximity they have to be, to play the games.  He had to drink to curb his thirst of jealousy🙈  His co-worker’s remark about how many staff became couples after the company event due to close interactions only fuel his jealousy further 😃  B.When your girlfriend meets your childhood friend When Park Seo Joon met his old childhood friend Jung Yu Mi, see the fireworks as Park MinYoung can’t help feeling jealous seeing how pretty she is & how close they are.  Jung Yu Mi even mentioned in jest about his ‘aura’😄 a personal trait only Park MinYoung knows🙃   Park Seo Joon teasing Park Min Young if she needs him to cool down her jealousy after knowing her reaction.    That’s all the green feels for today. Hope you’ve enjoyed this. Feel free to share your own fave scenes in the comments if you like too. Cheers🌞 Credits/Source: The images/GIF are not mine. Thank you Google.

Fight for my way. Ko dong-man ( Park seo-joon) is very cute when he is jealousy about Choi Aeara’s(Kim Ji-Won) actions.. It’ll make you watch it again.. he is such a cute jealousy boy.  My Love from Another Star. this drama also has some unforgettable jealousy scenes. our alien star is very when he is jealous,  Goblin. This drama is a very popular drama is Kdrama world. This drama also has some funny jealous scenes. Those are very cute watch when our Kim Shin is jealous.  You are beautiful. This drama also has some cute jealousy scenes. I even can remind them now and laugh. ( I’ve watched it few years ago)  Boys over Flowers. There are funny and cute jealousy scenes of Gu jun pyo.

Most of the rom-coms where there are two falling in love with the protagonist will have many jealousy scenes. However, there are few that I can re-call which are remarkable and memorable. The jealousy of Gu Jun Pyo(Lee Min Ho) when Gum Jan Di is more interested in Yoon Ji Hoo (Kim Hyun Joong) in the hit drama Boys over Flowers. In Full House, Lee Young-jae(Rain) gets super jealous when Han Ji-eun(Song Hye Kyo) get close to Yoo Min-hyuk(Kim Sung Soo) who is genuinly interested in her and wants to help her writing career. Rain does so many cute and funny things to express his jealousy and obstruct their meetings.  The Heirs had a lot jealousy scene between various couples. Initially, Rachel (Kim Ji-won) was jealous of Cha Eun-sang (Park Shin Hye) because Kim Tan(Lee Min Ho was interested in her. Later Kim Tan was jealous of Choi Young-do(Kim Woo Bin) as he was his rival as he was interested of Cha Eun-sang.

Jealousy Incarnate or Don’t Dare To Dream Don’t Dare to Dream, also known as Jealousy Incarnate (SBS 2016) is about TV news, family, love, jealousy… It’s well acted and hits both light humour and real emotional moments in every episode.  This k-drama has the best jealousy scenes I’ve never seen : 1 Scene : As you can see this scene of intense jealousy is hilarious because the woman has no idea what is going on and continues to pick up her octopus quietly.     2 Scene : Every jealousy scene of this drama is just iconic.    I don't want to spoil you the drama but I can only encourage you to watch this hilarious and moving masterpiece with a perfect OST!

Some of the best jealousy scenes are in these following dramas: Jealousy incarnateMy love from another starCheese in the trapGoblinThe heirsPersonal tasteBoys over flowersKill me heal meShe was prettyLegend of the blue seaLucky romanceCoffee princeSecret gardenThe greatest loveFated to love youTo the beautiful youKing 2 heartsYou're beautiful

SEARCH:WWW  One of the cutest jealousy scenes ever is in the series Search: WWW when tv actor Seol Ji-hwan (Lee Jae-wook) watches with his new girlfriend Cha Hyeon 'Scarlett’ (Lee Da-hee) his role in a drama that culminates with his onscreen kiss with his leading lady. Hyeon, being a fan of tv dramas is thrilled that the honscreen characters get their kiss on. However as poor Ji-hwan tries unsuccessfully to block Hyeons view of the oncoming smooch, watching Lee Da-hees brilliant facial transformation from excitedly tickled that her onscreen drama stars are finally locking lips to her slowburn realization that it is her real life ( at least in the series) boyfriend who is making out is just priceless! The leap from joy to green-eyed monster is captured perfectly by Lee Da-hee and there should be some award for Best Slowburn Reaction in a Series. She would win!

Well… there are various various K-DRAMAs that have jealousy scenes. They are so good as well as fun to watch. Acc. to me, the best jealous reactions were given by Lee Min ho in the drama The legend of the blue sea. And he's so cute when he is jealous. The scene when Sim Cheong(Jun ji Hyun) tries to win his heart by making him jealous…(gif below)  Actually her male friend is just pushing her hairs back (trying to help her in her “task”). Isn't he cute?Actually

For me, the actor who does the best jealousy scenes is Lee Min-ho. Therefore I would recommend these dramas with great jealousy scenes: The HeirsCity HunterBoys Over FlowersAnother drama with really good jealousy scenes is Cheese In The Trap, with Park Hae-jin as the jealous guy. Black also has good jealousy scenes with Song Seung-heon acting his jealous heart out. And who could forget Scarlet Heart Ryeo? Lots of jealousy in that drama!

Noble my love! has the best jealousy! Hero is so bossy that he even won’t let someone else touch heroine’s ankle!! P.s- if someone have the rec for a show where hero is as jealous as kang hoon than plz do rec…
There are lot of jealousy scenes in Whats wrong with secretary kim. It is a romantic comedy. We can see the jealousy of the main lead throughout the drama.
Legend of the blue sea, DOTS ,Exo next door, suspicious partner, school 2017. There are some more but for now check out this dramas in YouTube
